summary: This is an affidavit from an AT&T Legal Compliance Analyst and Custodian of Records verifying the authenticity of AT&T subscriber and call detail records. The affidavit states that the records were originally provided without certification, purged, and then mailed by Christian R. Everdell to the National Compliance Center on October 14, 2021. The document serves to certify that the attached records are consistent with AT&T's business practices and have not been altered.

persons.name: Christian R. Everdell
persons.context: Mailed the AT&T records to the National Compliance Center on October 14, 2021.

events.title: Mailing of AT&T Records
events.description: Christian R. Everdell mailed AT&T subscriber and call detail records to the National Compliance Center.

events.title: Affidavit Sworn
events.description: The affidavit verifying the authenticity of AT&T records was sworn to and subscribed before a notary public.

locations: 11760 US HIGHWAY 1, SUITE 600 NORTH PALM BEACH, FL 33408-3029
keyFacts: AT&T records were originally provided without certification and have been purged, making them unable to be recreated in the same format.
Christian R. Everdell mailed the AT&T records to the National Compliance Center on October 14, 2021.
The affidavit certifies that the attached AT&T records appear unaltered and are consistent with AT&T's regular business practices from 2008.
The affidavit was sworn before a notary public on October 20, 2021.
